health_discussed_people_names: Chairperson Committee on Health Services, Hon. Kibwana Swaleh
health_data_challenges: The concern raised about the payment methods for county services, stating that certain methods may lead to loss of money and corruption.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: The recommendation to continue applying the fees, charges, levy, and penalties for the Mombasa County Department of Health Services from the year 2018-2019 until further amendments are made.
health_sector_decisions: Amendment made to Clause 15 of the Bill to continue using the fees, charges, levy, and penalties for the Department of Health Services from 2018-2019.
